abi: function getConfig(address _pool) view returns (uint256 _minInvest, uint256 _maxInvest, uint256 _maxMembers, uint8 _votingThreshold, uint256 _votingTime, uint256 _minYesVoters)
function memberCanJoin(address _pool, uint256 _amount, uint256 _invested, uint256 _tokenPrice, uint256 _members) view returns (bool, string)
function setupPool(address _pool, uint256 _minInvest, uint256 _maxInvest, uint256 _maxMembers, uint8 _votingThreshold, uint256 _votingTime, uint256 _minYesVoters)
